name: Acile' Marak
description:
Acile' Marak is a small game about a boy stuck inside his house in winter. Oh, you also need to make a fire. You can interact with many objects and read stuff.

Controls
WASD to move
E to interact/comment
R to pick up/look up/ rotate items

Developers Commentary:

THE GAME HAS SOME ISSUES. SOME MECHANICS DON'T FULLY WORK, SO YOU NEED TO BUDGE THEM A BIT.I HIGHLY ADVISE ONLY USING THE 1920x1200 DISPLAY RES. IF YOU GET STUCK WHILE ROTATING STUFF, PRESS "F" AND DRAG THE CURSOR OVER THE OBJECT. I really hope you stick through it and experience what I've made.
